detailsData.title: Experienced Divorce Attorney
detailsData.content: Stephanie has earned a solid reputation as an experienced Divorce Attorney who effectively advances the interests of every client. She is committed to the success of every case she takes on.

detailsData.title: Compassionate Case Handling
detailsData.content: Our clients can expect us to handle their case with compassion while still zealously advocating for them in the courtroom. We understand the complexities of child custody.

detailsData.title: Exclusive Family Law Focus
detailsData.content: SLS Law has been exclusively handling family law matters including complex dissolutions for over 10 years. We handle property division, custody, child support, and maintenance.

detailsData.title: Proven Success
detailsData.content: Kendall is your paralegal, with years of proven experience and success for our clients. Get in touch with her now.

address: 8640 N. Green Hills Road, Suite 41, Kansas City, Missouri 64154
valueProp: Our skilled team of professionals are the backbone of SLS Law. Their ideas help shape the direction of our business as it continues to develop, and they have the wherewithal to get every job done right.

testimonalData.text: Stephanie is an exceptional attorney who truly cares about her clients.
